caption.p: EECP increased reactive oxygen species (ROS) levels and decreased mitochondrial membrane potential in MDA-MB-231 cells stimulated with LPS. (A) Fluorescence micrographs obtained at 24 h. (b, c) Values represent the relative fluorescence intensity per cell determined by laser scanning confocal microscopy. Values represent the mean ± SEM from three independent experiments ( ∗ P < 0.05 ∗∗ P < 0.01, vs. control, n = 3).
